sample_docs: How it works you get the result you aspire to . 1 Request what you need Send an inquiry, and we will contact you to best capture your needs and tailor an experience. Receive the quote You will receive our proposal to start working together on your next project. 2 3 Give feedback and then relax Whatever the final result agreed upon, we will keep working until you are satisfied. Services what we deal with Webflow websites Edit your website on day one of the web design process and watch it come together in real time. Memberstack memberships Add subscriptions to your website and gate content without the complexity of a similar product. Airtable databases Store, manipulate and edit data in large amounts, then connect it into any of the other No-code tools. Zapier automations Connect all of your services together and automate them without an engineer. Figma Anything design related happens here first. Website? Yes. App? Absolutely. Photoshop Editing photos and bitmap images more complex than an app is what this is for. Illustrator When the pen tool in Figma fails, we turn to the king of complex vectors. After Effects Animate illustrations in a way that you can't accomplish in browser. Mobile Applications, Web apps and Websites We create customized digital solutions, including mobile apps and web apps, with a focus on intuitive user experience and optimal performance. Our modern, responsive websites increase online visibility and foster digital success for our clients. Smartcards and NFC Solutions We develop solutions based on smart cards and NFC technology for access control, loyalty systems and virtual credit management such as prepaid cards. These solutions can be implemented on physical media and/or mobile applications. Blockchain We implement solutions based on public and private Blockchain. Blockchain technology allows data to be stored unchangeably and securely on a distributed database. Through smart contracts, we offer solutions for supply chain tracking, certification of documents, transactions and creation of digital identities. IoT Sensors such as humidity and light detectors, thermostats, accelerometers, and medical devices provide essential data for the digitization of healthcare. By connecting these devices through networks such as Lora and NBIoT, it is possible to continuously monitor people's environments and health, develop solutions for social distancing (UWB), and track supply chains. Machine learning e Data Analysis Machine learning and data analysis can improve your company's production processes. These techniques allow you to analyze business data to detect anomalies, prevent disruptions, predict demand for goods or services, create intelligent virtual assistants, and make data-driven decisions. Computer Vision Automatic processing of video and photos automates many technological solutions: real-time tracking of objects in logistics, authentication of people in access control systems, verification of proper use of masks in social work, and identification of pests in plants in botany. advantages Lots of benefits for your project On-time deliveries Through careful planning, dedicated resources and optimized processes, we ensure that each project is delivered on time, eliminating delays and meeting agreed deadlines. Effective communication We foster clear and continuous communication between the client and our development team. This approach minimizes misunderstandings, ensures that every change is implemented correctly, and ensures that requirements are fully met. High Quality Software Our commitment to quality results in defect-free, high-performance software that meets the most stringent standards. This ensures usability, effectiveness and a better user experience. Cost Control Through careful resource management and detailed planning, we keep costs under control, preventing budget overruns and promptly adapting to any changes in requirements. Regulatory Compliance We put data security first by implementing robust solutions that comply with privacy regulations. Our customers can be assured that their data is protected at all times. Support We offer timely and professional technical support even after software implementation, quickly resolving any problems and providing ongoing assistance to ensure maximum uptime. Stability and Scalability We design the software to be stable and scalable, capable of handling high workloads and an increasing number of users, thus ensuring consistent performance over time. Documentation We provide detailed and clear documentation, facilitating the use and maintenance of the software. Our customers can rely on comprehensive guides to exploit the full potential of our solutions. Trained team Our team consists of not only computer experts, but real scientists and researchers who have lent their knowledge to Research in the most eminent Italian Universities, dedicated to continuing education on new technologies. "Good Time is very good in what they're doing and more than happy to challenge and push you to think about your decisions both from usability and design standpoints.†Marino Franulovic Agency owner, Franulovic "Their work has significantly reduced my stress in having to imagine, design, then implement a new design language for the business.†Greg Barbosa Agency owner, Teller "High quality work, responsiveness, and most of all, very valuable feedback and advice that we appreciated.†Jordan Jadallah Finance, TYTO Dubbi? Rispondiamo tutte le tue domande Are the requests actually unlimited? Yes, kinda. Good Time doesn't charge hourly or per project. Instead, you'll get access to our Trello board where you can add as many requests as you'd like. We'll work our way through them in your preferred order. Which plan is right for me? Each plan has a short explanation for whom it could be for and the services it includes. If you have a need and you're not sure which plan you should choose, you can message us and we'll try to help you figure out which plan is right for you. How do I cancel my account? Go to account after logging in. Cancel anytime before your next recurring payment and you won't be charged. Forget to cancel the following month without using any asks? Let us know and we'll make it right. Are the payments monthly? Can I pay for longer? You pay monthly instead of hourly or by the project. It's simpler and lets you choose how long we work together. It's less complicated this way and gives you enough time to see if it's right for your brand. If you want a longer plan duration, try out a month or so first. If we're a good fit for each other, we'll make it happen. What kind of services do you offer? Check out the services section just above here to see the some of the services we offer in our plans. What do you use to make things? We currently use Figma for designs, Photoshop/Illustrator for print and photo-based asks, Webflow for developing websites, and After Effects for animations. How long will it take to fill a request? Because each and every request is different, it's hard to guarantee anything here but our general rule of thumb for a typical request is two business days. A typical request could be a landing page or logo. A non-typical request could extend out from there, which could be a request for multiple landing pages, a robust e-book, etc. In this case, you may receive multiple deliveries until the request is complete. Are there any contracts to use your services? There are no contracts or commitments to use our service. You can cancel at any time and return at any time. We are flexible and understand you may not have a consistent need for designs every single month. Why isn't Good Time available on Fridays? We're trying the 32-hour workweek out. During the industrial era, capitalism predicted that we'd work fewer hours when services become more automated. Turns out, we ended up working more. We want to subvert that expectation and use that extra day to take care of ourselves mentally and physically. Be kind to yourself. What happens if you get too many clients? Will I get bad product? We limit the amount of clients we can take on so that the quality is never spread too thin. If we open up more slots, we'll hire more designers and developers to fill that gap. Tell us about your idea Whether you are an individual or a company, we concretely realize your needs and bring your vision to life. Grazie! La tua richiesta è stata ricevuta. Ti risponderemo più presto possibile Ops, si è verificato un errore. Per favore ricarica la pagina e riprova. Send an email info@syscake.it Call us +39 351 825 0523 ABOUT US our team Work with us We are Syscake, a company founded in 2021 by professionals with experience in the world of research and technology transfer. We operate as a "laboratory,†designing and implementing tailor-made technology solutions for companies, aiming to expand their vision and improve their profits. We are committed to developing high-quality products both in of technology and security, while also offering continuous training and rapid adaptability to meet our customers' needs. We develop state-of-the-art technological solutions, make prototypes, experiment with different solutions and then identify the best one to the project that the company asks us or has in mind. All this is connected with the possibility of transferring the acquired know-how, re-engineering the prototype and putting it into production. If you request a technology that is not part of our services, we are able to provide it within a short period of time, activating a targeted study and training with user instructions for training the client. Innovation-driven IT consulting and software development: experts in AI, blockchain, and tailored web and mobile solutions. Start now Process Services Advantages FAQs ABOUT US Recensioni Work with us Contact Follow us Recensioni -2025 Syscake S.r.l.
